dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, where magic and mystery await. I'm a brave adventurer seeking fortune and glory.

dialogues.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialogues.text: Ah, a traveler! Come for supplies or information? My shop's full of all manner of wonders.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Actually, I'm looking for a local guide who knows the hidden paths and secrets of this forest.

dialogues.speaker: Guide
dialogues.text: (whispering) Meet me at the ancient oak tree under the light of the full moon. Be careful, stranger – not everyone in Eldoria is as friendly as they seem.
